title: ...And I Blinked
description: This is a book about a young lady trying to find herself. All she wants is to be wanted. Her life has been an obstacle of challenges, and she seeks the affection of different men. In the early years of Ayanas life, she stumbled across a few trials that helped her to grow as a person and succeed in a way that she thought was impossible. Ayana, born and raised in Chicago, is an entrepreneur, a romantic, and an overall naive person that is seeking a feeling to be wanted and be good enough throughout her life.
author: Tiffany D. Brown
